name: Fantastic Leap
summary: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.
description:
You launch yourself through the air at a foe. Attempt a High Jump or Long Jump. If you attempt a High Jump, determine the distance you can travel using the scale of a Long Jump. At the end of your jump, you can make a melee Strike.

 After your Strike, you fall to the ground if youâ€™re in the air. If the distance of your fall is no more than the height of your jump, you take no damage and land upright.
